attributes.action: Against the EU Calls To Censor Internet Searches, The Problem lies with Search Engines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After reading some stories about how the EU planned to censor internet searches it sounded like they were passing the buck and avoiding the real problem itself, and that real problem is the search engines themselves like Google etc, so this petition is against Censoring of the internet because ISPs are not the problem here.
